sentence.Network_en: Rotation of arrogate to oneself leases a building, what responsibility should assume?
sentence.Network_cn: 擅自转租房屋, 应承担什么责任?

sentence.Network_en: Don't arrogate evil motives to me.
Do not arrogate wrong intentions to your friends.
sentence.Network_cn: 不要硬说你的朋友存心不良.

list.abs: ...，这是在学习期间，过了入门的阶段，就不需要了。安全考虑：security consideration傲慢行为：arrogant behavior多极化：multipolarity
arrogantly 自大地arrogate to 硬性归于arrogate 冒称
arrogant person looks down on others ., 傲慢的人看不起其他人.
【摘要】 不可一世(insufferably arrogant)(Viva Live) 魔鬼的主意(Devil's desire)(Viva Live) 活着VIVA(Living Viva)(Viva Live).

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 16th cent.: from Latin arrogat- 'claimed for oneself', from the verb arrogare, from ad- 'to' + rogare 'ask'

entry.def: If someone arrogates to themselves something such as a responsibility or privilege, they claim or take it even though they have no right to do so.

example.ex: The assembly arrogated to itself the right to make changes...
He arrogated the privilege to himself alone.

means.word_mean: 1. demand as being one's due or property; assert one's right or title to;

sentences.sentence: "He claimed his suitcases at the airline counter"
"Mr. Smith claims special tax exemptions because he is a foreign resident"

means.word_mean: 3. seize and take control without authority and possibly with force; take as one's right or possession;

sentences.sentence: "He assumed to himself the right to fill all positions in the town"
"She seized control of the throne after her husband died"

stems_affixes.word_buile: ar一再+rog要求,问+ant……的→一再要求的→傲慢的
derogate[v.贬低,诽谤]+ory……的→adj.不敬的,诽谤的
ar一再+rog要求,问+ance表名词→一再要的→arrogance傲慢
pre预先+rog要求+ative……的→预先要求→[有]特权
ab去掉+rog要求,问+ate表动词→不再要求有→取消掉
ar一再+rog要求+ate表动词→一再要求→硬是说
de向下,坏+rog要求,问+ate表动词→坏坏的问下去→贬低
inter在……中间+rog要求,问+ate表动词→在[审问室]中问→审问
pro前+rog要求,问+ue→提前问好[下次开会日期]→休会
sur下面+rog要求+ate使……→v.使代理, 使代替

sentences.en: That firm arrogated itself the right to develop this area.
sentences.cn: 那家企业冒称有权开发这一地区。
